review: i have really enjoyed this game it isnt the brain dead just follow the gold arrow game play there are a good amount of mechanics and classes and that translates into multiple playthroughs the loot is meaningful and you also have a cheap way of respeccing it is very similar to diablo 2 and path of exile but has its own kinda brand this game is money well spent
